languages.text:
The cyber-mastiff gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} and deals +100% more {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
When the cyber-mastiff {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} the {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apprehended{/g} enemy, the cyber-mastiff gains a stacking +{uip|STR|cfced9bbf78741568fc1d5eb5f55c219} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Strength{/g} and +{uip|TGH|cfced9bbf78741568fc1d5eb5f55c219} Toughness for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.

languages.text:
Siber mastif, +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Silah Yeteneği{/g} niteliği kazanır ve +%100 daha fazla {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir.
Siber mastif, {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}göz hapsindeki{/g} düşmana {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vurduğunda{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Kuvvet{/g} niteliğine +{uip|STR|cfced9bbf78741568fc1d5eb5f55c219} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Dayanıklılık{/g} niteliğine +{uip|TGH|cfced9bbf78741568fc1d5eb5f55c219} bonus (ikisi de üst üste birikebilir) kazanır. Bu etki 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer.

languages.text:
Кибермастиф получает +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнему Бою{/g} и наносит на 100% больше {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}.
Совершая {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадание{/g} по {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}цели захвата{/g}, кибермастиф получает суммирующийся {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +{uip|STR|cfced9bbf78741568fc1d5eb5f55c219} к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Силе{/g}, а также суммирующийся бонус +{uip|TGH|cfced9bbf78741568fc1d5eb5f55c219} к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Выносливости{/g} на 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунд{/g}.

languages.text:
サイバーマスチフの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器スキル{/g}が+10され、与える{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}が+100%上昇する。
サイバーマスチフの攻撃が{g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}捕縛された{/g}敵に{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}したとき、サイバーマスチフは1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}腕力{/g}に+{uip|STR|cfced9bbf78741568fc1d5eb5f55c219}の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}、および{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}耐久力{/g}に+{uip|TGH|cfced9bbf78741568fc1d5eb5f55c219}のボーナスがスタックされる。

languages.text:
Der Cyber-Mastiff erhält +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} und verursacht +100 % mehr {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}.
{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Trifft{/g} der Cyber-Mastiff den {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}gestellten{/g} Gegner, erhält er 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang einen stapelbaren {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +{uip|STR|cfced9bbf78741568fc1d5eb5f55c219} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Stärke{/g} und einen stapelbaren Bonus von +{uip|TGH|cfced9bbf78741568fc1d5eb5f55c219} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Zähigkeit{/g}.

languages.text:
El cibermastín recibe +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} e inflige un +100 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional.
Cuando el cibermastín {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g} al enemigo {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}apresado{/g}, gana una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} acumulativa de +{uip|STR|cfced9bbf78741568fc1d5eb5f55c219} a la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Fuerza{/g} y una bonificación acumulativa de +{uip|TGH|cfced9bbf78741568fc1d5eb5f55c219} a la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Resistencia{/g} durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g}.

languages.text:
生化獒犬的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}提高10点，造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}提高100%。
每当生化獒犬{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}被{g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}捕获{/g}的敌人时，{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}力量{/g}都会提高{uip|STR|cfced9bbf78741568fc1d5eb5f55c219}点，{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}坚韧{/g}提高{uip|TGH|cfced9bbf78741568fc1d5eb5f55c219}点。此效果可叠加，持续一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

languages.text:
Le cyber-mastiff bénéficie de +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Capacité de combat{/g} et inflige +100 % de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires.
Chaque fois que le cyber-mastiff {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} l'ennemi {g|f:f39e0e323f314259b3e7510b110d3a4b}appréhendé{/g}, il gagne un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} cumulable de +{uip|STR|cfced9bbf78741568fc1d5eb5f55c219} à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerStrength}Force{/g} et un bonus cumulable de +{uip|TGH|cfced9bbf78741568fc1d5eb5f55c219} à l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerToughness}Endurance{/g} pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}.
